Class HW2_zfergus2

  • java.lang.Object

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, java.util.EventListener, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.media.opengl.GLEventListener
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    HW3_zfergus2

    public class HW2_zfergus2
extends HW1_zfergus2
    HW02 of CS451 Computer Graphics: Draws geometric primitives bouncing in between a rectangle and a circle inside said rectangle.
    Author:
    Zachary Ferguson
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  HW2_zfergus2.CohenSutherlandLineClipping
      Implementation of the Cohen Sutherland Line Clipping algorithm, algorithm for clipping a line to be inside a clipping area.
      static class  HW2_zfergus2.SutherlandHodgmanPolygonClipping
      Implementation of the Sutherland Hodgman Polygon-Clipping Algorithm, algorithm for clipping a polygon to be inside a clipping area.

        Draws an empty rectangle given the bottom left and upper right corner.

        yMin - Y position of the bottom left corner.
        xMax - X position of the upper right corner.

      • collideWithBounds

        protected void collideWithBounds(int pointIndex)
        Check for a collision between the point and the bounds. If there is a collision, bounce the point of the bound.
        Parameters:
        pointIndex - Index of the point and velocity vector.

        public void reshape(javax.media.opengl.GLAutoDrawable drawable,
                    int x,
                    int y,
                    int width,
                    int height)
        Method called for OpenGL rendering every reshape. Adjusts the width and height stored values. Calculate the radius of the circle. Centers the viewport so (0,0) is in the center.
        Specified by:
        reshape in interface javax.media.opengl.GLEventListener
        Overrides:
        reshape in class HW1_zfergus2
        Parameters:
        drawable - Needed, but unused parameter.
        x - X position of the frame.
        y - Y position of the frame.
        width - The new width of the frame.
        height - The new height of the frame.
        See Also:
        GLEventListener
